name: SYNDIGO - AI-Powered Image Attribute Extraction and Anomaly Detection
description: AI-powered solution to minimize errors and reduce time users spend entering product details based on information found in product images, helping speed up the go-to-market process through automatic attribute extraction and anomaly detection.
challenge: Users manually entering image attribute data was time-consuming and delayed product market launch. Risk of errors increased with manual entry, and the challenge intensified when images were uploaded in bulk requiring manual access for each image attribute.
solution: Image-based extraction on individual attributes (text, metadata, key elements)
Customization options for tone and industry type to tailor extraction for specific contexts
Popup preview for reviewing extracted content with accept or rerun options
Use of OpenAI GPT-4o API as Azure service to leverage multimodal capabilities
99.9% automatic extraction accuracy of product details

impact.masterDataManagement: Consistent information across manufacturer to retailer channels
impact.goToMarketAcceleration: Significant reduction in time-to-market for product launches

outcomes: 99.9% automatic extraction accuracy of product details
Enabled master data management with consistent information across various channels
Significant reduction in manual effort and time-to-market for product launches
Enhanced data quality and reduced human error in product attribute entry
